original: @49a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽gzhan gyi rig sngags kyis byas pa mnan par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: @49a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo // gzhan gyi rig sngags kyis byas pa mnan par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /

original: dur khrod kyi g-yam pa sngon po la dug dang khrag gis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la lte ba la che ge mo la rig sngags nan zhes pa bri /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi g-yam pa sngon po la dug dang khrag gis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la lte ba la che ge mo la rig sngags nan zhes pa bri /
translated: The practitioner who is endowed with the commitments and who wishes to suppress that which is done by the mantras of others should draw a vajra cross with poison and blood on a blue piece of cloth from a charnel ground. In the center, write “So-and-so’s mantra is suppressed.”

original: rva rnams la lam nan zhes pa bri /
analyzed: rva rnams la lam nan zhes pa bri /
translated: On the prongs, write “path is suppressed.”

original: mu khyud la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags thams cad stam bha ya nan zhes pa bri /
analyzed: mu khyud la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags thams cad stam bha ya nan zhes pa bri /
translated: On the circumference, write “All worldly and transcendent mantras are suppressed.”

original: de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum du aa mo gha badzra nan aom lam a'a: lam h'um lam zhes bzlas pas lam rgya gram dum nan pas bskal pa gnyis su de'i rig sngags kyi nus pa 'byung mi srid do //
analyzed: de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum du aa mo gha badzra nan aom lam a'a: lam h'um lam zhes bzlas pas lam rgya gram dum nan pas bskal pa gnyis su de'i rig sngags kyi nus pa 'byung mi srid do //
translated: Then, by reciting “Amoghavajra is suppressed, oṃ laṃ āḥ laṃ hūṃ laṃ” for two or three days, the path is suppressed with a cross. It is impossible for the power of that mantra to arise for two eons.

original: gzhan gyi rig sngags mnan pa gser gyi ri bo zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rig sngags mnan pa gser gyi ri bo zhes bya ba /
translated: The “golden mountain” suppression of others’ mantras.

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of the master Jñāna-vajra is complete.
